properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM( SELECT FAQ_NO, CATE_NAME, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_STATUS FROM FAQ F, CATEGORY C WHERE F.FAQ_CATE = C.CATE_NO ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC) A) WHERE R BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_STATUS = 'N' WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
INSERT INTO FAQ(FAQ_NO, FAQ_CATE, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, ?,?,?,'Y')
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_CATE = ?, FAQ_TITLE = ?, FAQ_CONTENT = ? WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM FAQ WHERE INSTR(FAQ_TITLE, ?)>0
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM FAQ F, CATEGORY C WHERE F.FAQ_CATE = C.CATE_NO AND INSTR(CATE_NAME, ?)>0

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM( SELECT FAQ_NO, C.CATE_NAME, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_STATUS FROM FAQ F, CATEGORY C WHERE F.FAQ_CATE = C.CATE_NO AND INSTR(FAQ_TITLE, ?)>0 ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC) A) WHERE R BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM( SELECT FAQ_NO, C.CATE_NAME, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_STATUS FROM FAQ F, CATEGORY C WHERE F.FAQ_CATE = C.CATE_NO AND INSTR(C.CATE_NAME, ?)>0 ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC) A) WHERE R BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM( SELECT QNA_NO, CATE_NAME, QNA_ID, QNA_ENTERDATE, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_ANSWERDATE, QNA_ANSWER, QNA_STATUS FROM QNA Q, CATEGORY C WHERE Q.QNA_CATE = C.CATE_NO ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) A) WHERE R BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT QNA_NO, CATE_NAME, QNA_ID, QNA_ENTERDATE, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_ANSWERDATE, QNA_ANSWER, QNA_STATUS FROM QNA Q, CATEGORY C WHERE Q.QNA_CATE = C.CATE_NO AND QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE QNA SET QNA_ANSWER = ?, QNA_STATUS = 'N' , QNA_ANSWERDATE = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM QNA Q WHERE INSTR(QNA_TITLE, ?)>0
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM QNA Q, CATEGORY C WHERE Q.QNA_CATE = C.CATE_NO AND INSTR(CATE_NAME, ?)>0

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM( SELECT QNA_NO, CATE_NAME, QNA_ID, QNA_ENTERDATE, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_ANSWERDATE, QNA_ANSWER, QNA_STATUS FROM QNA Q, CATEGORY C WHERE Q.QNA_CATE = C.CATE_NO AND INSTR(QNA_TITLE, ?)>0 ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) A) WHERE R BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM( SELECT QNA_NO, CATE_NAME, QNA_ID, QNA_ENTERDATE, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_ANSWERDATE, QNA_ANSWER, QNA_STATUS FROM QNA Q, CATEGORY C WHERE Q.QNA_CATE = C.CATE_NO AND INSTR(CATE_NAME, ?)>0 ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) A) WHERE R BETWEEN ? AND ?
